plot: The young race car driver Vittorio is undecided whether to marry the rich widow Diana or the innocent young girl Adriana. Vittorio indecision brings suffering to Diana and Adriana until he is killed in an automobile accident.
title: La vedova X
plot_es: The young race car driver Vittorio is undecided whether to marry the rich widow Diana or the innocent young girl Adriana. Vittorio indecision brings suffering to Diana and Adriana until he is killed in an automobile accident.
plot_en: The young race car driver Vittorio is undecided whether to marry the rich widow Diana or the innocent young girl Adriana. Vittorio indecision brings suffering to Diana and Adriana until he is killed in an automobile accident.
